searchDocs.title: new​
searchDocs.content: Constructors </> Future.new() → Future<T...> Creates an uncompleted future.

searchDocs.title: completed​
searchDocs.content: Constructors </> Future.completed( ...: T...-- The completed values. ) → Future<T...> Creates a completed future.

searchDocs.title: delay​
searchDocs.content: Constructors </> Future.delay( sec: number,-- How long to delay until the future completes. ...: T...-- The completed values. ) → Future<T...> Creates a future and completes with the provided values after sec seconds.

searchDocs.title: race​
searchDocs.content: Constructors </> Future.race(futures: {Future<T...>}) → Future<T...> Creates a new future that completes with the values from the first future to complete in the provided array.

searchDocs.title: isCompleted​
searchDocs.content: Methods </> Future:isCompleted() → boolean Returns whether the future has been completed or not.

searchDocs.title: complete​
searchDocs.content: Methods </> Future:complete( ...: T...-- The completed values. ) → () Completes the future with the provided values. This method will error if the future has already been completed.

searchDocs.title: expect​
searchDocs.content: Methods </> Future:expect() → T...-- The completed values. Yields until the future is complete and returns the completed values.
